alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 10:07AM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Yockanookany River Near Kosciusko affecting Attala County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding of farmland along the river is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue rising to 20.9 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Yockanookany River Ofahoma 19.0 15.9 Mon 8 am CDT 16.4 20.0 20.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
